# Invariants: codex.ts

## Constraints
- **GITHUB_API_RELEASES**: "https://api.github.com/repos/openai/codex/releases/latest"
- **GITHUB_HTML_RELEASES**: "https://github.com/openai/codex/releases/latest"
- **CACHE_DIR**: join(homedir(), ".opencode", "cache")
- **CACHE_TTL_MS**: 15 * 60 * 1000
- **CODEX_INSTRUCTIONS_URL**: `https://raw.githubusercontent.com/openai/codex/${latestTag}/codex-rs/core/${promptFile}`
- **TOOL_REMAP_MESSAGE**: `<user_instructions priority
